channel.title: Visualization on DataHaven extras
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on DataHaven extras

item.title: 500 Cities Project: Connecticut
item.description: Visualization of Connecticut data from the 500 Cities Project, a CDC and Robert Wood Johnson Foundation collaboration of local-level public health data.

item.title: Financial (in)security in Connecticut
item.description: Visual exploration of the uneven landscape of financial security in Connecticut.

item.title: Hartford-West Hartford Neighborhood Profiles
item.description: Maps and charts of Census data for Hartford and West Hartford’s neighborhoods.

item.title: Legislative District Profiles
item.description: Maps of Census data for Connecticut’s state House and Senate districts, plus DataHaven Community Wellbeing Survey data for Senate districts. Includes statewide comparisons and information on each district’s legislator. We see this as a way to supply information in support of advocacy.

item.title: New Haven Neighborhood Profiles
item.description: Maps and charts of Census data for New Haven’s neighborhoods.

item.title: The many wage gaps in Connecticut
item.description: Visual exploration of the wage gap(s) in Connecticut by gender, race, education, occupation, and their overlaps.

item.title: Waterbury Neighborhood Profiles
item.description: Maps and charts of Census data for Waterbury’s zip codes.
